file.name: forms-flow-python-api-spec.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: formsflow.ai API
  description: 'The API for formsflow.ai. Checkout: formsflow.ai to know more'
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:5000
  - url: http://{{baseurl}}
components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
    apikeyAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: apikey
security:
  - apikeyAuth: []
tags:
  - name: application
  - name: application > {application id}
  - name: application > {application id} > history
  - name: dashboards
  - name: draft
  - name: draft > public
  - name: draft > public > {draft id}
  - name: draft > {draft id}
  - name: form
  - name: form > {form id}/submission/{submission id}
  - name: form > {mapper id}
  - name: groups
  - name: groups > {group id}
  - name: metrics
  - name: public
paths:
  /application/{application_id}/history:
    get:
      tags:
        - application > {application id} > history
      summary: Get application history
      description: >-
        : application_id:- Getting application history by providing
        application_id
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: application_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
          example: '2'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: text/plain
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
              example: ''
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                applications:
                  - formUrl: >-
                      http://localhost:3000/form/61b857cff85e92f5958f8a03/submission/6296e8eae7720c1bcfb8bdd6
                    applicationStatus: New
                    created: '2022-06-01 04:19:57.118021'
                    submittedBy: john.honai
    post:
      tags:
        - application > {application id} > history
      summary: Post a new application using the request body
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example:
                id: 2
                applicationStatus: Reviewed
                created: '2022-04-28 10:18:03.521461'
                formUrl: >-
                  http://localhost:3000/form/626a42e228d493440d3580d6/submission/626a69da85ba0250e51141fc
                submittedBy: formsflow-client
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: application_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
          description: '(Required) '
          example: '2'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: text/plain
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
              example: ''
        '201':
          description: CREATED
          headers:
            Server:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: gunicorn
            Date:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: Wed, 01 Jun 2022 07:14:38 GMT
            Connection:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: keep-alive
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json
            Content-Length:
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: '241'
            X-Frame-Options:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: DENY
            Access-Control-Allow-Origin:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: '*'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                created: '2022-06-01 07:14:38.099773'
                formUrl: >-
                  http://localhost:3000/form/626a42e228d493440d3580d6/submission/626a69da85ba0250e51141fc
                id: 5
                applicationId: 2
                applicationStatus: Reviewed
                submittedBy: formsflow-client
  /application/{application_id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - application > {application id}
      summary: Get application by id
      description: ': application_id:- List the application for particular application_id'
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: application_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
          description: '(Required) '
          example: '2'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: text/plain
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
              example: ''
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                id: 2
                applicationName: New Business License Application
                modifiedBy: service-account-forms-flow-bpm
                formUrl: >-
                  http://localhost:3000/form/61b857cff85e92f5958f8a03/submission/6296e8eae7720c1bcfb8bdd6
                processKey: two-step-approval-listener
                processInstanceId: 1776837b-e162-11ec-974d-0242ac120006
                processTenant: null
                applicationStatus: New
                created: '2022-06-01 04:19:55.422250'
                modified: '2022-06-01 04:19:57.294518'
                formProcessMapperId: '878'
                processName: Two Step Approval-listener
                createdBy: john.honai
                formId: 61b857cff85e92f5958f8a03
                submissionId: 6296e8eae7720c1bcfb8bdd6
    put:
      tags:
        - application > {application id}
      summary: Update application details
      description: ': application_id:- Update the application for particular application_id'
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example:
                id: 15
                formId: 626a42e228d493440d3580d6
                formUrl: >-
                  http://localhost:3000/form/626a42e228d493440d3580d6/submission/6296ff78bbe1c77a328df300
                submissionId: 6296ff78bbe1c77a328df300
                applicationStatus: Approved
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: application_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
          description: '(Required) '
          example: '15'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: text/plain
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
              example: ''
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example: Updated successfully
  /application:
    get:
      tags:
        - application
      summary: Get applications
      description: |-
        : Id:- List the application for particular id
        : applicationName:- Retrieve application list based on application name
        : applicationStatus:- List all applications based on status
        : createdBy:- To retrieve applications based on createdby
        : created:- Retrieve the applications based on date and time
        : modified:- Retrieve the applications based on modified date and time
        : pageNo:- To retrieve page number
        : limit:- To retrieve limit for each page
        : orderBy:- Name of column to order by (default: id)
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: text/plain
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
              example: ''
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                applications:
                  - id: 15
                    applicationName: New Business License Application
                    modifiedBy: service-account-forms-flow-bpm
                    formUrl: >-
                      http://localhost:3000/form/61b857cff85e92f5958f8a03/submission/6296e8eae7720c1bcfb8bdd6
                    processKey: two-step-approval-listener
                    processInstanceId: 1776837b-e162-11ec-974d-0242ac120006
                    processTenant: null
                    applicationStatus: New
                    created: '2022-06-01 04:19:55.422250'
                    modified: '2022-06-01 04:19:57.294518'
                    formProcessMapperId: '878'
                    processName: Two Step Approval-listener
                    createdBy: john.honai
                    formId: 61b857cff85e92f5958f8a03
                    submissionId: 6296e8eae7720c1bcfb8bdd6
                totalCount: 26
                limit: null
                pageNo: null
  /application/create:
    post:
      tags:
        - application
      summary: Post a new application using the request body
      description: |-
        : formId:- Unique Id for the corresponding form
        : submissionId:- Unique Id for the submitted form
        : formUrl:- Unique URL for the submitted application
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example:
                formId: 626a42e228d493440d3580d6
                formUrl: >-
                  http://localhost:3000/form/626a42e228d493440d3580d6/submission/6296ff78bbe1c77a328df300
                submissionId: 6296ff78bbe1c77a328df300
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: text/plain
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
              example: ''
        '201':
          description: CREATED
          headers:
            Server:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: gunicorn
            Date:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: Wed, 01 Jun 2022 05:57:20 GMT
            Connection:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: keep-alive
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: application/json
            Content-Length:
              schema:
                type: integer
                example: '346'
            X-Frame-Options:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: DENY
            Access-Control-Allow-Origin:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: '*'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                created: '2022-06-01 05:57:20.128424'
                formUrl: >-
                  http://localhost:3000/form/626a42e228d493440d3580d6/submission/6296ff78bbe1c77a328df300
                id: 15
                modifiedBy: null
                modified: '2022-06-01 05:57:20.128431'
                createdBy: service-account-forms-flow-bpm
                applicationStatus: New
                processInstanceId: null
                formProcessMapperId: '1'
  /application/formid/{form_id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - application
      summary: Get applications
      description: ': form_id:- Retrieve application list based on formid'
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: form_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: '(Required) '
          example: 624d71460d7e747ab1b85d73
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: text/plain
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
              example: ''
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                applications:
                  - id: 2442
                    modifiedBy: service-account-forms-flow-bpm
                    formUrl: >-
                      https://localhost:3000/form/624d71460d7e747ab1b85d73/submission/6295e161e7720c1bcfb8bb89
                    processInstanceId: 02df9949-e0c5-11ec-974d-0242ac120006
                    applicationStatus: New
                    created: '2022-05-31 09:35:30.198911'
                    modified: '2022-05-31 09:35:31.175404'
                    formProcessMapperId: '1090'
                    createdBy: john.doe
                    formId: 624d71460d7e747ab1b85d73
                    submissionId: 6295e161e7720c1bcfb8bb89
                totalCount: 70
  /application/status/list:
    get:
      tags:
        - application
      summary: Method to get the application status lists
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: text/plain
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
              example: ''
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
              example:
                applicationStatus:
                  - Approved
                  - New
  /dashboards:
    get:
      tags:

      summary: List all dashboards
      security:

  /dashboards/{dashboard_id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - dashboards
      summary: Get  dashboard
      description: ': dashboard_id:- Get dashboard with given dashboard_id'
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []

        - name: dashboard_id

          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
          description: '(Required) '
          example: '19'

  /draft/public/{draft_id}:
    put:
      tags:
        - draft > public > {draft id}
      summary: Update draft details
      requestBody:
        content: {}
      parameters:
        - name: draft_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: '(Required) '
          example: '-28702638'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: text/plain
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
              example: ''
  /draft/public/{draft_id}/submit:
    put:

      summary: Updates the application and draft entry to create a new submission
      requestBody:
        content: {}
      parameters:
        - name: draft_id
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: '(Required) '

      summary: Update draft details

            schema:
              type: object
              example:
                data:
                  color: yellow is nice
      security:

      parameters:

          in: path

          required: true
          description: '(Required) '
          example: '19'
      responses:

          description: OK
          headers:
            Content-Type:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: text/plain
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
              example: ''

              schema:
                type: object
              example: Updated 19 successfully
